GetTracerShootPos.description:
EFFECT [Client] Used to get the "real" start position of a trace, for weapon tracer effects. "real" meaning in 3rd person, the 3rd person position will be used, in first person the first person position will be used.

[Vector] pos
  Default position if we fail

[Weapon] ent
  The weapon to use.

[number] attachment
  Attachment ID of on the weapon "muzzle", to use as the start position.

Init.description:
EFFECT [Client] 

[CEffectData] effectData
  The effect data used to create the effect.

PhysicsCollide.description:
EFFECT [Client] 

[table] colData
  Information regarding the collision. See CollisionData structure

[PhysObj] collider
  The physics object of the entity that collided with the effect.
